page.title: 11AT WORSHIP
page.content: Fishing folk often have their {BETHEL} or Brethern Hall. Our largest is Elcho Hall begun in 1896 and still holding meetings for breaking of bread, prayer, gospel study and for old and young people. Membership is over 100. {COCKENZIE OLD PARISH}is 100 years old this year with about 500 members. 1956-1976 saw hall improvements, the belfry rebuilt, new leaded glass windows, a new pipe organ, new heating system and a new pulpit. {CHALMER'S MEMORIAL CHURCH}was a Free Church now back in the Church of Scotland. Internal religious decorations are lovely eg. doves of peace, the cross crowned with thorns, 3 crowns and a star for the Trinity, sayings of Jesus carved on the pulpit sides and fishermen and a pelican carved on the pulpit steps.
